content:
I bet it'll absolutely useful if the Carin BB team may come up with max data EOB samples rather than "some" samples hardly covering a half of the elements. Such sample(s) may look a bit redundant from the business point of view but will be 100% helpful to implementers.

Could you do that?

We appreciate the interest and need for more robust data examples. This has been a bit of an uphill battle as it has difficult to procure realistic data and the means to synthesize such data is not currently available. As I write this, I am working on a project meant to help provide more samples. We continue our invite to the payer community in assisting us in this endeavor.
